name: My Chemical Romance: Demolition Lovers
description:
When I was  13,   I took an old-school Game Maker course  in the basement of my local library and the result is perhaps the most essential  emo tween experience: a My Chemical Romance-themed  scrolling shooter complete with lore. Astoundingly, it was also an award-winner by virtue of being  the only entrant in  the library's game design contest.

I would recommend holding down the spacebar the whole time to shoot and avoiding the walls in the third level.
